verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2250"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w marriage|strong="G1062"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cana|strong="G2580"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was \w called|strong="G2564"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w marriage|strong="G1062"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they \w wanted|strong="G5302"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, the \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, They \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Woman|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1698"\+w* \+w to do with|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w*? \+w mine|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w hour|strong="G5610"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2240"\+w* \+w not yet|strong="G3768"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2240"\+w*.\wj*

\w His|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto the \w servants|strong="G1249"\w*, \w Whatsoever|strong="G3739"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \add it\add*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w set|strong="G2749"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w waterpots|strong="G5201"\w* of \w stone|strong="G3035"\w*, after the manner \w of|strong="G2596"\w* the \w purifying|strong="G2512"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w containing|strong="G5562"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w firkins|strong="G3355"\w* \w apiece|strong="G0303"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Fill|strong="G1072"\+w* \+w the waterpots|strong="G5201"\+w* \+w with water|strong="G5204"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w filled|strong="G1072"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* up \w to|strong="G2193"\w* the \w brim|strong="G0507"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Draw out|strong="G0501"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w bear|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w unto the governor of the feast|strong="G0755"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w bare|strong="G5342"\w* \add it\add*.

\w When|strong="G5613"\w* the ruler of the \w feast|strong="G0755"\w* had \w tasted|strong="G1089"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w* that was \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w whence|strong="G4159"\w* it \w was|strong="G2076"\w*: (\w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1249"\w* which \w drew|strong="G0501"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w*;) the governor of the \w feast|strong="G0755"\w* \w called|strong="G5455"\w* the \w bridegroom|strong="G3566"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* at the \w beginning|strong="G4412"\w* doth set \w forth|strong="G5087"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* men have well \w drunk|strong="G3184"\w*, \w then|strong="G5119"\w* that which is \w worse|strong="G1640"\w*: \add but\add* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* hast \w kept|strong="G5083"\w* \w the|strong="G3631"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* of \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cana|strong="G2580"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* manifested \w forth|strong="G5319"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* he went \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w continued|strong="G3306"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Jews’|strong="G2453"\w* \w passover|strong="G3957"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* at \w hand|strong="G1451"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* those that \w sold|strong="G4453"\w* \w oxen|strong="G1016"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doves|strong="G4058"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the changers of \w money|strong="G2773"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w made|strong="G4160"\w* a \w scourge|strong="G5416"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* small \w cords|strong="G4979"\w*, he \w drove|strong="G1544"\w* them \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* the \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w oxen|strong="G1016"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* poured \w out|strong="G1632"\w* the \w changers’|strong="G2855"\w* \w money|strong="G2772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w overthrew|strong="G0390"\w* the \w tables|strong="G5132"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto them that \w sold|strong="G4453"\w* \w doves|strong="G4058"\w*, \wj  \+w Take|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w hence|strong="G1782"\+w*; \+w make|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father’s|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w an house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w of merchandise|strong="G1712"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w remembered|strong="G3415"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, The \w zeal|strong="G2205"\w* \w of|strong="G3624"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* hath \w eaten|strong="G2719"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w up|strong="G2719"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w sign|strong="G4592"\w* shewest \w thou|strong="G1166"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, seeing \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou \w doest|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Destroy|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5126"\+w* \+w temple|strong="G3485"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w three|strong="G5140"\+w* \+w days|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w I will raise|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w up|strong="G1453"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w Forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w was|strong="G3618"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* in \w building|strong="G3618"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wilt|strong="G1453"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w rear|strong="G1453"\w* it \w up|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* \w spake|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G4983"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* he was \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w remembered|strong="G3415"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w said|strong="G2036"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* \add day\add*, \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*, when they \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* the \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w did|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w commit|strong="G4100"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w needed|strong="G5532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* should \w testify|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*.
